ComicInfo.Title: Early One Morning in Baghdad; Bull & Tad's Excrement Adventure; How the Future Has Changed; Road Sign; The Human Mind!; Lack Brain; Japanese Entertainment Take Overs; Early One Morning in the City; My Stupid Identity Joined Forces with Supedupboy; Skateboards of the World!; Man Invents the Wheel; Ailing Nation; The Two-Hundred-Dollar-a-Day Bum; More Freak Outs from Back to the Future!; One Fine Day in Florence
ComicInfo.Summary:
Man invents the wheel - and starts the first game shows.
How ideas from Cracked magazine supposedly influenced the Back to the Future film series.
Mona Lisa uses the toilet.
